Description: Ostracon, fragment from the body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, interior grooved and exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with faint traces of two lines of black-painted hieratic text on the exterior specifying contents as year 7 wine.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389867) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389867)
